parameters.query: ={{ "SELECT id, tenant_id, client_final_id, numero_devis, montant_ht, montant_ttc, tva_taux, description, mode_paiement, statut FROM devis WHERE id = '" + $json.devisId + "' AND tenant_id = '" + $json.tenantId + "' AND statut = 'acceptee'" }}

={{ "SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(numero_bdc FROM 'BDC-[0-9]{4}-([0-9]+)') AS INTEGER)), 0) + 1 as next_num FROM bons_commande WHERE tenant_id = '" + $('02. Parser').first().json.tenantId + "' AND numero_bdc LIKE 'BDC-' || EXTRACT(YEAR FROM NOW())::text || '-%'" }}

={{ "INSERT INTO bons_commande (id, tenant_id, client_final_id, numero_bdc, date_bdc, date_validite, montant_ht, montant_ttc, tva_taux, description, mode_paiement, statut, devis_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), '" + $('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.tenantId + "', " + ($('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.clientFinalId ? "'" + $('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.clientFinalId + "'" : "NULL") + ", '" + $('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.numeroBdc + "', '" + $('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.dateBdc + "', '" + $('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.dateValidite + "', " + $('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.montantHt + ", " + $('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.montantTtc + ", " + ($('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.tvaTaux || 20) + ", " + ($('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.description ? "'" + $('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.description.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'" : "NULL") + ", " + ($('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.modePaiement ? "'" + $('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.modePaiement + "'" : "NULL") + ", 'brouillon', '" + $('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.devisId + "', NOW(), NOW()) RETURNING id, tenant_id, client_final_id, numero_bdc, date_bdc, date_validite, montant_ht, montant_ttc, tva_taux, description, mode_paiement, statut, devis_id, created_at, updated_at" }

={{ "SELECT id, devis_id, code_article, designation, quantite, prix_unitaire_ht, total_ht, ordre FROM devis_lines WHERE devis_id = '" + $('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.devisId + "' ORDER BY ordre ASC" }}
={{ "UPDATE devis SET statut = 'commandee', updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = '" + $('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.devisId + "' RETURNING id, numero_devis, statut" }}
